{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT310N |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/10/2009 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT310NV2 |ic_id=3839A-WRT310NV2 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=4.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4716B0;BCM4716B0KFBG, CS0943 P20, 943242 N1; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25X32VSIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6EH-5H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 5-pad header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4716B0;BCM4716B0KFBG, CS0943 P20, 943242 N1; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,TomatoUSB |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:25:9C |oui_eth=00:25:9C |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-N Gigabit Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT310N}} "3762-02010206R" is silkscreened on the board. {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT310N_v2}} [http://dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=57459&highlight=wrt310n On the DD-WRT forums] The power adapter included with the device is a '''Linksys''' AD12V/1A-SW. ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:Linksys_WRT310N_v2_board_top.jpg|board top [[Has images::internal| ]] ==TTL Serial Connection== You'll need a 3.3v capable TTL level converter like CP2102 chipset device. (find at amazon, ebay, etc) The unpopulated pads are labeled J14. Pinout is: 3.3v, TX, RX, NC?, GND. Serial settings 115200,8,N,1. File:wrt310n_v2_TTL-serial_overview.jpg|Overview File:wrt310n_v2_TTL-serial_pinout.jpg|Pinout File:USB-TTL-232-485-converter.jpg|USB Converter (notice TX->RX and RX->TX)
